# Sample blocklist for testing
# Contains mix of IPv4 and IPv6, public and private

# Public IPv4
1.1.1.1
8.8.8.8
45.33.32.156

# Private IPv4 (should be filtered)
10.0.0.1
192.168.1.1
172.16.0.1

# Public IPv6
2001:4860:4860::8888
2606:4700:4700::1111

# Private IPv6 (should be filtered)
fe80::1
fd00::1
::1

# CIDR ranges
1.2.3.0/24
2001:4860::/32

# Embedded in text
Block this IP: 93.184.216.34 immediately
IPv6 threat: 2620:fe::fe detected

# Leading zeros
001.002.003.004
